# ziti_posture_check_mfa (Data Source)

Ziti Posture Check Data Source, type: MFA check

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ziti_posture_check_mfa" "test_posture_check_mfa" {
  name = "test_mfa"
}

output "ziti_check_mfa" {
  value = data.ziti_posture_check_mfa.test_posture_check_mfa
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Identifier
- `name` (String) Name of the Posture Check
- `prompt_on_unlock` (Boolean) Prompt mfa when device unlocks.
- `prompt_on_wake` (Boolean) Prompt mfa when device wakes.
- `timeout_seconds` (Number) MFA check time out in seconds.

### Read-Only

- `role_attributes` (List of String) Role Attributes
- `tags` (Map of String) Posture Check Tags
